name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Castoria (0%)
description: Any servant that doesn't kill themselves can do this. Needs 10% append and 20% on Arash.
instructions: Castoria skills on DPS. Swap for Oberon and S1+S3. NP with Arash
Second Oberon uses S1 to fill DPS to 100%
Both Oberon use S2 to fill gauge again. Apply remaining buffs and NP

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Reines (10%)
description: Servants which self charge 10% can use Reines. This is not usually recommended since her attack buff is targeted
instructions: Reines provides 30% each to Arash and DPS. Swap for Oberon and S1+S3. NP with Arash
Second Oberon uses S1 to fill DPS to 100%
Both Oberon use S2 to fill gauge again. Apply remaining buffs and NP

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Waver (20%)
description: Servants which provide 20-30% self gauge by T2 will usually prefer Waver over other options.
instructions: Waver skills on Arash. Swap for Oberon and S1+S3. NP with Arash
Second Oberon uses S1 to fill DPS to 100%
Both Oberon use S2 to fill gauge again. Apply remaining buffs and NP

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Vitch (40%)
description: Servant provides 40% charge T2 or 50% charge T3.
instructions: Oberon skills on Arash, then swap for Oberon and S1
Use Vitch buffs, charge to 100% with skills and NP
Charge again with remaining skills

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Vitch (40% vs Knights)
description: Oberon can clear wave 1 if the main servant can provide 50% gauge T3 (this includes refunders like Artoria).
instructions: Vitch skills on DPS. Swap for Oberon. Use both Oberon S1s. One Oberon uses S2+S3 on self and NPs
NP with DPS, who is already at 100%
Oberon S2 + servant's own skills to refill

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Castoria (0%, Backloaded)
description: Any servant that doesn't kill themselves can do this. Needs 10% append and 20% on Arash. Uses Both Oberon S3 on T3 for cases where Arash doesn't need it T1.
instructions: Castoria skills on DPS. Swap for Oberon and S1. NP with Arash
Second Oberon uses S1 to fill DPS to 100%
Both Oberon use S2 to fill gauge again. Apply remaining buffs and NP

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Reines (10%, Backloaded)
description: Servants which self charge 10% can use Reines. This is not usually recommended since her attack buff is targeted. Uses Both Oberon S3 on T3 for cases where Arash doesn't need it T1.
instructions: Reines provides 30% each to Arash and DPS. Swap for Oberon and S1+S3. NP with Arash
Second Oberon uses S1 to fill DPS to 100%
Both Oberon use S2 to fill gauge again. Apply remaining buffs and NP

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Waver (20%, Backloaded)
description: Servants which provide 20-30% self gauge by T2 will usually prefer Waver over other options. Uses Both Oberon S3 on T3 for cases where Arash doesn't need it T1.
instructions: Waver skills on Arash. Swap for Oberon and S1. NP with Arash
Second Oberon uses S1 to fill DPS to 100%
Both Oberon use S2 to fill gauge again. Apply remaining buffs and NP

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Vitch (40%, Backloaded)
description: Servant provides 50% charge T3. Uses Both Oberon S3 on T3 for cases where Arash doesn't need it T1.
instructions: Vitch skills on DPS, then swap for Oberon and S1 + S2 Arash
Use the next Oberon's S1 and NP
Charge again with remaining skills

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Merlin (Vitch DPS Only)
description: Vitch can use Merlin as long as Arash can clear wave 2.
instructions: Merlin applies buffs since Oberon is not on the field yet. Swap for Oberon, use his S1, use Vitch's skills on herself and NP with her.
Arash should be at 70% gauge after Vitch's NP, so use his S3 and Oberon's S3, then NP
Use the remaining skills to refill and NP

name: [BUSTER] Vitch + Waver + Oberon (Vitch DPS Only)
description: Can use double Vitch + Waver to simulate Merlin if Arash can't clear wave 2 or if your friend has a high NP level.
instructions: Vitch #1 applies S3 (and optionally S2) to self. Waver applies all skills to Vitch #1. Swap in Oberon and S1 + S2 on Vitch #2, then NP with Vitch #2
Apply Vitch #2 skills to Vitch #1 and NP with Vitch #1.
Use both Vitch S1 on Vitch #1. Reapply her S2 and S3, use plugsuit buff, NP

name: [BUSTER] Double Vitch + Oberon (Melusine Only)
description: The infamous Melusine combo.
instructions: Melusine S1 + S3 into NP
Refill with both Vitch S1s
Swap in Oberon. Use his skills along with Melusine's (which are off cooldown)

name: [BUSTER] Vitch + Waver + Oberon (Friend Melusine)
description: The fact that Melusine's S3 gives 100% gauge instead of 50% means that you can sub in a 50% charger for one Vitch at the expense of some stats.
instructions: Melusine S3 into NP
Refill with both supports
Swap in Oberon. Use his skills along with Melusine's (which are off cooldown)

name: [BUSTER] Double Vitch + Waver (Oberon DPS Only)
description: Oberon can loop with double Vitch and a split charger.
instructions: Use Vitch buffs, charge with Waver S3 and Oberon S1 + S2
Use Vitch S1, swap in the other Vitch and use all her skills
Use Waver's first skill and all of Oberon's skills

name: [BUSTER] Double Vitch + Oberon (Caster Cu Only)
description: Cu can loop with double Vitch without Oberon, but we're swapping him in for damage anyway.
instructions: Use Cu's S1 and S3, both Vitch buffs and one Vitch charge skill. Swap in Oberon and use S1
Use the other Vitch charge skill and reapply Cu's S3
Oberon S2 + S3

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Merlin (80%)
description: You can use Arash to sneak Merlin into a double Oberon team as long as the DPS gives 20% gauge T2 and 50% T3 (i.e. CasCu) or 80% T3 (i.e. Avicebron).
instructions: Use Merlin buffs, swap for Oberon, Oberon buffs Arash
Support Oberon comes in. Use Cu S1 + S3 and Oberon S1, or else Oberon S2 if using Avicebron
Oberon's remaining skills + plugsuit buff

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Vitch + Miss Crane (10% Bronze)
description: With a party cost limit of 114, you can squeeze Miss Crane in as long as your DPS is a 1-star unit with a 10% battery (i.e. Spartacus).
instructions: Use Oberon's skills on Arash. Swap in Crane, charge her NP, then NP with Crane and Arash. (DPS must be in the front position.)
Use Oberon's S2 and Vitch's damage skills. Charge the last 10% using the DPS's skills and NP
Vitch and Oberon provide 50% each

name: [BUSTER] Double Oberon + Vitch (Ozymandias vs 1-1-X)
description: Ozy clears the first two waves in a 1-1-X node, then Oberon clears the last.
instructions: Ozy uses all skills, Vitch charges Ozy and buffs Obe, Obe uses S1, Ozy NPs
Swap Oberon for another support if you didn't do that T1 (options are Oberon, Waver, or Castoria). Fill Ozy to full with their skills + Oberon S2 and then NP again with Ozy
Ozy's skills are now off CD, so use S1 + S3 to fill the last 20% of Obe's gauge and then NP

name: [ARTS] Double Castoria + Oberon (Optimistic)
description: Best case double-Castoria setup. Space Ishtar can sometimes get enough refund on 1-2-X here.
instructions: Apply Castoria S1s and S3s. Use one S2 on your whale friend's NP5 Castoria, then NP with her and the looper
Apply the other Castoria S2 to the damage dealer. Swap in Oberon and S1. Refill gauge with the looper's skills if needed, then NP with Castoria and the looper
Oberon S2 + S3

name: [QUICK] Double Skadi + Oberon
description: Dual Skadi for reference. Only Caren and maybe Voyager can realistically use this for 2-2-X. Instructions below for Caren.
instructions: Use friend Skadi S1 + S3 and your own Skadi's S1. (If friend Skadi doesn't have the append skill, use S2 and swap for Oberon). Use Caren's S1 + S2 and NP
Got 10% refund and 20% from Caren's S1. Use Oberon's S1 and Skadi's S3 and NP again
Starting from 30% again, so use Oberon's S2 + S3 and Caren's S3

name: [BUSTER] Double Vitch + Oberon (50%)
description: Servant provides 10% charge T1-T2 and then 50% on T3 (meaning the CD must be 6T at most). This usually just reduces T1 damage in favor of maybe increasing T2/T3 damage, depending on the servant's kit.
instructions: Use any skills with 6T cooldowns. Oberon charges up Arash and Arash NPs. (Don't use Oberon's S3 unless it's not needod T3.)
Use Vitch's skills, swap for the other Vitch and use S2 + S3
Refill with servant's own charge skill (now off CD) and Vitch's S1
